content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0, 0) with 49 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace (position 2, 0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace (position 4, 0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal
- Furnace (position 6, 0) with 0 iron ore and 0 coal

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace at position (0, 0) was full when trying to insert coal, which resulted in the failure. Check the inventory status of the furnace before inserting items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Repeated errors
- The same error regarding inserting coal into the furnace at position (0, 0) has occurred multiple times. Review the inventory management to avoid filling the furnace before attempting to insert more items.
